The String object is used to manipulate a stored piece of text.
===Static Methods===
|| *Name* || *Parameters* || * Description * ||
||isString||Object object||Checks if _object_ is a String||

===Public Methods===
|| *Name* || *Parameters* || *Description* ||
||replaceAll||String regexp||Replaces all ocurrences of _regexp_ on the String||
||toCharArray||_void_||Returns an array with the chars on String||
||trim||_void_||Removes white spaces on the begin and the end of the String||
